data.message:
I've always believed in a higher power.  Life has always been a study for me, personalities and behavior..Beliefs..Etc.

I use to listen to your music, then I realized something

You're angry.  And I decided that I don't want to listen to some angry guy cry about his inability to improve his environment with unlimited resources.  Then I concluded, he must be using his money to feed something other than happiness.. I thought, it's probably selfish-pride.

I ain't mad though.  Do what makes you feel relevant.
